interfaces

Interface GeneralRepositoryInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeneralRepository

    public interface GeneralRepositoryInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Operational interface of a remote object of type Playground. It provides the functionality to access the Playground.
